reporter_caption.center: Gloria D. PORTER v. DEPARTMENT OF EMPLOYMENT SECURITY, 138 Vt. 650 (1980)

caption.center: Gloria D. PORTER v. DEPARTMENT OF EMPLOYMENT SECURITY

opinion.opinion_text: Appellee's brief shall be filed by October 10, 1980, or the appellee shall be subject to the provisions of V.R.A.P. 31(c) with respect to oral argument.
